name: convert_name_to_symbols
description: Convert an english worded chemical name to a list of symbols. The name can be a chemical formula (e.g. Iron Oxide 2 -> Fe2O3), an element (e.g. Oxygen -> O), or a chemical system (e.g. Lithium-Iron-* -> Li-Fe-*). Wildcards are supported. It must be worded and not a chemical formula. If it is a chemical formula, use the other tools directly.
